# coordinate

**Instance Property**

The coordinate of the circle overlay’s center.

## Declaration

```swift
get coordinate(): Coordinate;
set coordinate(coordinate: Coordinate);
```

## Defining the circle

- **radius**: The circle overlay’s radius, in meters.
